pull.title: [QT] fix thin space word wrap line brake issue
pull.body: The thin space QT html hack results in cut-off chars/nums after a line break. Avoid word wrap line breaks by using a smaller font and a line break before each alternative value).

events.message:
[QT] fix thin space word wrap line brake issue

The thin space QT html hack results in cut-off chars/nums after a line break.

Avoid word wrap line breaks by using a smaller font and a line break before each alternative value)

events.body: utACK needs backport to 0.11 and possibly 0.10
Binaries: https://bitcoin.jonasschnelli.ch/pulls/6694/ Linux Gitian/QT5: Windows:
Can't reproduce on fedora 23, GNOME. Concept ACK, though.
Backported to 0.11 as 834e299564cb2b6fad7d4ea76d03a2c15fc80561, to 0.10 as f696ea12e18b9f9e1518a59f3ad36ba887f4f31a
